name: Crime Shoot
description:
Controls:

ONLY with gamepads

Right trigger - Shooting
Right thumbstick - turn around
Left thumbstick - Walk around
A - join
B - set camera

GAMEPLAY:

The mayor is greedy and not funding the police department , so the police department decides to hire killers to kill civilians and rise the need for crime fighters  as well as then putting 50% of fund in the pocket.

Put cameras and shoot the kills on it! Make people NEED the police.

-------------------------------------------------------------
the game is up to 4 players (gamepad only) 
-------------------------------------------------------------
Music : Bensound_-_High_Octane
